title: Impementation Guide Generator
description: Adds support for a FHIR implementation guide to an existing server project.

project.description: Name of the Nx server project to add the implementation guide to

id.description: ID of the implementation guide to add

igVersion.description: Version of the implementation guide to add

package.description: URL or file path to the implementation guide package tgz file

install.description: Whether to install the conformance resources so they are available from their endpoints, otherwise they are only available to the server internally

skipOps.description: Skip adding any operations to the server project

opDirectory.description: Directory to place generated operations (relative to the project root)

skipCs.description: Skip adding custom capability statement to the server project

csLocation.description: Path to the file for the custom capability statement

validate.description: Whether to verify the implementation guide package before adding it
